SEARCH
Package org.example.common

Interface IGateway

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
Gateway
public interface IGateway extends Remote
The IGateway interface defines the methods for a remote Gateway object that provides various operations related to URL management, search, statistics, and Barrel management. This interface is designed to be used with RMI for remote communication and to serve clients.

  • Method Details

    • insertURL

      void insertURL(String url) throws RemoteException
      Inserts a URL into the queue.
      Parameters:
      url - the URL to be inserted
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • addFirst

      void addFirst(String url) throws RemoteException
      Inserts a URL into the beggining of the queue.
      Parameters:
      url - the URL to be inserted
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • search

      List<SearchResult> search(ArrayList<String> search) throws RemoteException
      Searches for a specified terms and returns the searched results.
      Parameters:
      search - the search terms
      Returns:
      the searched results as a SearchResult object
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • getConnections

      SearchResult getConnections(String url) throws RemoteException
      Searches for all URL connections of the given URL.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL given to search for its connections
      Returns:
      the search results as a SearchResult object
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote error occurs during the search

    • getStatistics

      SystemStatistics getStatistics() throws RemoteException
      Retrieves the latest system statistics.
      Returns:
      The latest statistics.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an RMI error occurs.

    • registerStatisticsListener

      void registerStatisticsListener(IStatistics listener) throws RemoteException
      Registers a client to receive live statistics updates.
      Parameters:
      listener - The listener that will receive updates.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an RMI error occurs.

    • broadcastStatistics

      void broadcastStatistics(SystemStatistics stats) throws RemoteException
      Broadcasts the current statistics to all registered listeners. This method can be used to send the current system statistics to all clients that are listening for updates.
      Parameters:
      stats - the SystemStatistics to be broadcast.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs during the broadcast.

    • registarBarrel

      void registarBarrel(String rmi) throws RemoteException
      Registers a Barrel instance with the Gateway using the provided RMI address. This method associates a Barrel with the Gateway for communication and management.
      Parameters:
      rmi - the RMI address of the Barrel to be registered.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs during registration.

    • unregisterBarrel

      void unregisterBarrel(String rmi) throws RemoteException
      Unregisters a Barrel instance from the Gateway using the provided RMI address. This method dissociates a Barrel from the Gateway, effectively removing it from management.
      Parameters:
      rmi - the RMI address of the Barrel to be unregistered.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs during unregistration.

    • getBarrels

      Map<String,IBarrel> getBarrels() throws RemoteException
      Retrieves all currently registered Barrels. This method returns a map of RMI addresses to Barrel objects.
      Returns:
      a map of RMI addresses to IBarrel objects representing the registered Barrels.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs while retrieving the Barrels.

    • getStopwords

      List<String> getStopwords() throws RemoteException
      Retrieves a list of stopwords currently used by the system. These stopwords are words that are typically ignored in searches due to their common usage.
      Returns:
      a list of stopwords used by the system.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs while retrieving the stopwords.

    • hacker

      void hacker(String title) throws RemoteException
      Performs a search on Hacker News top stories and adds URLs to the queue if any of the search terms are found in the article's title, text, or HTML content.

      This method queries the Hacker News API for the top stories, normalizes the search title by removing diacritical marks and punctuation, and then searches for each term in the title and text of the articles. If no match is found, it fetches the HTML content of the article and checks there as well.

      Parameters:
      title - the search title used to match against Hacker News articles' titles, texts, and HTML content.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a remote communication error, including failures to connect to the Hacker News API.

    • getAI

      String getAI(String search, List<SearchResult> result) throws RemoteException
      Performs an AI-based search and analysis on the provided search term and search results. The method utilizes AI to enhance the search results or provide recommendations based on the input.
      Parameters:
      search - the search term to analyze.
      result - a list of SearchResult objects to be used for AI analysis.
      Returns:
      the AI-generated response based on the search and results.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs during the AI search.
